summary: This mod adds the type of ore in each mine to it's name on the map and adds a number of mines to the map.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]This mod is now available on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3172/?]Skyrim Special Edition[/url]!

If I was going around, filling in my map, myself, as I explored mines; I would put a note, on the map, as to what each mine was. That way I wouldn't go half way across the country and waste time mining in an iron mine, if I needed gold! This mod adds the type of ore in each mine to it's name on the map, so mines like 'Bilegulch Mine' become 'Bilegulch Mine (Orichalcum).' It also adds a number of map markers, to mines on the map, so that main cities don't have ores appended to their names.

MINES WITH ALTERED NAMES:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Bilegulch Mine (Orichalcum)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Embershard Mine (Iron)[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Gloombound Mine (Ebony)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Kolskegger Mine (Gold)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Left Hand Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Lost Prospect Mine (Gold)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Northwind Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Soljund's Sinkhole (Moonstone)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Whistling Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
MAP MARKERS ADDED TO THE MAP:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Dushnikh Mine (Orichalcum)[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Fenn's Gulch Mine (Silver)[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Fort Fellhammer Mine (Iron)[/size]
[/*][*][size=2]Goldenrock Mine (Corundum)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Halted Stream Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Iron Breaker Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Mor Khazgur Mine (Orichalcum)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Quicksilver Mine (Quicksilver)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Redbelly Mine (Ebony)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Rockwallow Mine (Iron)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Sanuarach Mine (Silver)[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Steamscorch Mine (Malachite)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
MAP MARKER CHANGES:
[/size][list][*][size=2]Soljund's Sinkhole (Cave -> Mine): The cave is short, contains more then enough mining spots, and is the only Moonstone mine.[/size][/*]
[/list][list][*][size=2]Darkwater Crossing (Mine -> Town): Goldenrock Mine is now marked, itself. The settlement can be shown as a settlement.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
SKUP COMPATIBILITY MOD DIFFERENCES:
[list][*]Updated Redbelly Mine to Iron.[/*]
[*]Updated Northwind Mine to Ebony.
[/*][/list][/size][size=2]
NOTE:
Please let me know if anyone sees any errors, or let me know if you have any requests or opinions. I am here to serve! This is a very simple mod; however, so I don't expect many. 

Some people might find the inclusion of some map markers (like Fort Fellhammer) to be redundant, as there is a marker for the 
Fort and the Mine. I, personally, wanted to be able to find a fort (or get the marker from a quest) without psychic knowledge that there was a mine inside. I also like the fort still being marked as a fort, not a mine. But tell me what you think!

CREDIT: 
The original idea came from [url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/boomshicleafaunda/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]Boom[/url]'s [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=17828]Detailed Map Markers[/url]. Unfortunately, Boom has not updated in quite a while and some of the markers are incorrect. Also, Boom's mod is only available on the Skyrim [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/browse/?appid=72850]Workshop[/url]. As I hate the workshop, I decided to rebuild Boom's mod for Nexus! I rebuilt it from the ground up, I did not use any of Boom's mod; not even as a template.

UPDATES: 
[/size][list][*][size=2]v1.0 - RELEASE[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2] Changed the names of 9 mines.
Added 12 map markers to Mines in the game.[/size]
[size=2] Changed Soljund's Sinkhole from a cave map marker to a mine map marker.[/size]
[list][*][size=2]v1.1[/size][/*]
[/list] Changed Darkwater Crossing's map marker from a mine to a town.
Added SKUP Compatibility mod.
author: Degrelescence

files.name: Detailed Map Markers v1.0
files.changelogHtml:
Changed the names of 9 mines.
Added 12 Map Markers to Mines in the game.
Changed Soljund's Sinkhole from a cave map marker to a mine map marker.

files.name: Detailed Map Markers v1.1
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Darkwater Crossing's map marker from a mine to a town.
Added an SKUP compatible version.

Changed Darkwater Crossing's map marker from a mine to a town.
Added an SKUP compatible version.
